titleStmt.title: Jovis decimo quinto die Junij, 1699, annoque regni Regis Willielmi Tertij ... whereas by the ancient laws and statutes of this realm, there ought to be but one weight and measure used throughout this kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Child Mayor.
Second part of title taken from first two lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
